catentdesc.name: Socket Cap Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Durable hex drive cap screw with fine thread
catentdesc.longdescription: This reliable tension fastener can be installed in a counterbored hole or on the surface. Typically used for clamping assemblies. Suitable for tool and die fixture applications.

catentdesc.name: Knurled Thumb Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Slip-resistant thumb screw with Class A thread fit
catentdesc.longdescription: Knurling is minimal but effective for easy hand tightening in this fully threaded thumb screw. Low head is ideal in tight spaces for reduced interference.

catentdesc.name: Washer Head Lag Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Extra-long, low-profile lag screw
catentdesc.longdescription: This lag screw provides unbeatable strength for wood-to-wood or metal-to-wood fastening. Features a T30 torx drive, type A screw point, and coarse threads.

catentdesc.name: Captive Panel Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Hex socket fastener designed for cabinets and enclosures
catentdesc.longdescription: Designed for semi-rigid fastening of panels or boards, this panel screw allows for easy surface removal or repair. Use in conjunction with a female adapter that accepts the panel screw.

catentdesc.name: Captive Panel Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Hex socket fastener designed for cabinets and enclosures
catentdesc.longdescription: Designed for semi-rigid fastening of panels or boards, this panel screw allows for easy surface removal or repair. Use in conjunction with a female adapter that accepts the panel screw.

catentdesc.name: Socket Head Shoulder Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Precision-grade shoulder screw with hex socket
catentdesc.longdescription: Built for superior strength, this shoulder screw allows moving parts to rotate around or slide along its length. Works with shims in various lengths. Features a Class B thread fit.

catentdesc.name: Socket Head Shoulder Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Precision-grade shoulder screw with hex socket
catentdesc.longdescription: Built for superior strength, this shoulder screw allows moving parts to rotate around or slide along its length. Works with shims in various lengths. Features a Class B thread fit.

catentdesc.name: Fillister Head Machine Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Small-diameter, fully threaded machine screw
catentdesc.longdescription: For maximum driving power, this screw combines a high head height with a small head diameter. Ideal for applications that require highly secure fasteners for metal panels on industrial equipment.

catentdesc.name: Socket Set Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fully threaded, headless cup-point set screw
catentdesc.longdescription: This extra-long set screw provides maximum hold on a wood contact surface with a thin-edged cup point. Available in two standard lengths.

catentdesc.name: Socket Set Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fully threaded, headless cup-point set screw
catentdesc.longdescription: This extra-long set screw provides maximum hold on a wood contact surface with a thin-edged cup point. Available in two standard lengths.

catentdesc.name: Tap-in Binding Post
catentdesc.shortdescription: Frearson-drive binding post with permanent drive cap
catentdesc.longdescription: Ideal for wood-to-wood or industrial material binding, these durable screws allow for easy adjustment without any damage to the material being fastened.

catentdesc.name: Flange-Head Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Nonmarring, high-strength machine screw
catentdesc.longdescription: Get an extra-strong hold with the increased contact area provided by this screw's wide flange. Fully threaded with a hex head and Class 3A thread fit.

catentdesc.name: Hex Head Shoulder Screw
catentdesc.shortdescription: Versatile screw with an integral journal between the head and thread
catentdesc.longdescription: The unthreaded cylindrical shoulder on this machine screw can act as a pivot point, mounting pin, or axle for a rolling part. Offers optimal shoulder-diameter and shoulder-length tolerances for applications that require industrial strength fastening capability.

catentdesc.name: Hex Head Shoulder Screw
